---
title: "Research"
---

My research examines political psychology and political behavior, with special attention to identity, ideology, and partisan conflict.

## Current research areas

- Affective polarization and mass attitudes
- Identity and political behavior
- Electoral politics in the United States
- Public opinion and democratic accountability
